meta.content: Contact us or Visit us in our Windows and Doors Showroom - JFK Windows and Doors, Dublin
Come visit the JFK Windows and Doors showroom. For a free survey or quote call us on 01 450 4001 or email sales@jfkwindowsanddoors.ie

body.class: page page-id-75 page-template page-template-custom-visit-php custom-font-enabled single-author

header.h1: Contact us or Visit us in our Windows and Doors Showroom

img.alt: Location! Click for Directions to our windows and doors showroom

div.h1:
Phone Us on 01 450 4001
or email us at sales@jfkwindowsanddoors.ie
div.p: You can phone us or email us for a free quote or to organise a free survey of your windows and doors.

Or come visit our comprehensive windows and doors showrooms complete with a large selection of windows and doors, located in Dublin 12 – just off the Naas Road. We are open from 9 – 5 Monday to Friday and are available at weekends and evenings by appointment. We also offer a free design and survey service that can be carried out at a time that suits you.

If you are going to visit our showroom, if you want to, you can send us some details of your project and schedule a visit so that we can prepare some options for you before you arrive with the form below!

div.div: Fields marked with a * are required

div.label: Suggest a day for showroom visit (Try include an approx time in the info box below) *

div.class: field-wrap submit-wrap label-left btn-wrap btn-success-wrap btn-large-wrap

div.p: Our Supply and fit service comes with our manufacturers 10 year guarantee , covering both glass and frames  a guarantee that's unmatched in Ireland!

Our showroom, located just off the Naas Road, offers free parking. This, coupled with our friendly and experienced staff offers peace of mind when it comes to choosing your windows and doors for your investment.

JFK WINDOWS AND DOORS
John F Kennedy Drive,
JFK Industrial Estate,
Naas Road,
Dublin 12
